channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Secure External Authentication Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Secure External Authentication Server

item.title: CVE-2021-29725|2024-09-16T19:25:58.209Z -- ibm -- secure%20external%20authentication%20server
item.description: IBM Secure External Authentication Server 2.4.3.2, 6.0.1, 6.0.2 and IBM Secure Proxy 3.4.3.2, 6.0.1, 6.0.2 could allow a remote user to consume resources causing a denial of service due to a resource leak.

item.title: CVE-2021-29726|2024-09-16T16:53:41.236Z -- ibm -- secure%20external%20authentication%20server
item.description: IBM Sterling Secure Proxy 6.0.3 and IBM Secure External Authentication Server 6.0.3 does not properly ensure that a certificate is actually associated with the host due to improper validation of certificates. IBM X-Force ID: 201104.
